articles.content: Apple's useful Sign in with Apple option that was disclosed in June 2019 received a fair bit of positive attention, and for good reason: it replaces social logins with a secure authentication system.… [+2036 chars]

articles.title: Xiaomi Mi Band 5 release date confirmed and first image leaked - TechRadar
articles.description: Coming June 11
articles.content: The Xiaomi Mi Band 5 has been rumored for a while and it looks set to be a feature-packed and much cheaper alternative to a Fitbit. But it wont just be a rumor for much longer, as the company has rev… [+1370 chars]

articles.title: Redmi Note 9 Pro Max goes on sale today on Amazon and Mi website - Republic World - Republic World
articles.description: The Redmi Note 9 Pro Max is finally set to go on sale in India today on Amazon and company's official website. Continue reading for price, specs and more.
articles.content: Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro Max is set to go on flash sale in India today. The Redmi Note 9 Pro and the Redmi Note 9 Pro Max were launched back in March where the former had gone on sale a little earlier… [+2726 chars]

articles.author: Roydon Cerejo
articles.title: Dell Latitude 9510 Business Laptop With Up to 34 Hours of Battery Life Launched in India - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Dell has launched a new laptop in India, designed for the demanding business user. It features a metallic design, up to 34-hour battery life, 5G-ready and features an AI-powered system optimiser program.
articles.content: Dell Latitude 9510 has joined the company's product portfolio in India as the latest business-focussed laptop. First shown off at CES 2020, the Latitude 9510 packs in a 15-inch display in a form-fact… [+2075 chars]
